mapper.select: SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_pic goodsPic, goods_name goodsName, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_price goodsPrice, goods_num goodsNum, spec_name specName, spec_title specTitle, spec_price specPrice, goods_detail goodsDetail, goods_sales goodsSales, sort sort, category_id categoryId, tuijian tuijian, reason_return reasonReturn, sell_count sellCount FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}

mapper.update: UPDATE shop_goods SET goods_pic = #{goodsPic} , goods_name = #{goodsName} , goods_title = #{goodsTitle} , goods_price = #{goodsPrice} , goods_num = #{goodsNum} , spec_name = #{specName} , spec_title = #{specTitle} , spec_price = #{specPrice} , goods_detail = #{goodsDetail} , goods_sales = #{goodsSales} , sort = #{sort} , category_id = #{categoryId} , tuijian = #{tuijian} , reason_return = #{reasonReturn} , sell_count = #{sellCount} , goods_id = #{goodsId} WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
